page.title: 05Oil Industry, Montrose.
page.content: Since the discovery and extraction of {oil}from the{North Sea,Montrose}has seen a growth of oil related companies bringing employment and new residents. In the{Industrial Estate}to the east of the A937 there are three {engineering}companies, Merpro Ltd. Hughes Offshore and Varco Ltd. as well as a company which specialises in producing{protective clothing}for the oil industry,Angus Workwear. Otis Pressure Control Ltd. have been sited on the Estate since 1973 and employ 167 people many of whom work on oil rigs all over the world.Petroleum Industries Training Board also occupy a site and train oil rig workers,again from all over the world,in matters of {safety}and fire fighting.It is from the{PITB}that black smoke billows every day.This has been a cause for concern among some local residents.
